page.title: 11WYLAM FAYRE & COMMUNITY WEEK
page.content: {WYLAM SUMMER FAYRE This fayre is held annually around mid-June on Wylam Jubilee Field. It holds a three mile fun-run, stalls, display tents and an enclosed area in the middle of the field which is used for several displays, e.g. Keep fit girls, Scottish pipers and Highland dancers. Most of the stalls are run by local organizations to provide finance for them.(see photograph a) {COMMUNTITY WEEK The community week is during the Autumn and Winter months. The activities held are a firework display for the 5th of November, exhibits of North'd crafts and an exhibition by Wylam art group. There are also several discos and at the end of the week a community "knees up." The money raised all goes to The Institutes funds.
